entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is introduced as the person from whom Harry takes the wand.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is described as a person who roars with laughter when the wand turns into a rubber chicken.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is introduced as a person who freezes in an attitude of stunned disapproval.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as the father of Percy and Harry's friend.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is introduced as a person who booms with laughter and offers betting odds.

entities.name: ireland
entities.description: Ireland is mentioned as the country that will supposedly win in a bet.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is introduced as a person who will supposedly get the Snitch.

relationships.description: Bagman gave the wand to Fred.
The wand belonged to Bagman before he gave it to Fred.
Percy is the son of Mr. Weasley.
Ludo Bagman is betting on Ireland to win.
Krum will supposedly get the Snitch.
